title: Midsummer is behind! Full speed towards winter!
content:
Yesterday here was that Midsummer thing.
"Many people get indecently drunk and happy. The statistics of the number of people drowned and killed in accidents is morbidly counted every year. Also statistics of assaults demonstrates a peak for this weekend."
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midsummer#Finland]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midsummer#Finland[/url]

Anyways, "Solstitial celebrations still center upon June 24, which is no longer the longest day of the year. The difference between the Julian calendar year (365.2500 days) and the tropical year (365.2422 days) continue to move the day associated with the actual astronomical solstice forward approximately one day in approximately every seven centuries."
That doesn't matter much.. The days are getting darker and hopefully colder slowly. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] Ah, winter..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: 1/KeenRush
content:
Hooray! I'll take that unwanted sunshine, thankyou very much. I'm so tired of hybernating.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sleepslug.gif[/img] Yeeeaaah Summer!!!Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"You are so afraid to live--so afraid of life itself--that you've given up the very nature of your being in trade for security."
-CWG Book 3, Neale Donald Walsh

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: 1/KeenRush
content: Hmmm.. There should be some way to redirect all the light beams to Australia instead of them arriving in Finland.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Midsummer is behind! Full speed towards winter!
content:
Ah winter, just what I needed.
It sure was hot as hell here the past couple of days. No fun, I almost passed out last friday.-----------------

Jamster! rules!
